reviewText: I watched Gil Gerard in Buck Rogers. He did a excellant job there and this is another movie worth watching. Gil Gerard played a Detective and he played the part very well. Noone could have done better. This movie deserves five stars.

gil gerard is one of the best modern day actors. in this movie his love interest tells him that women are attracted to him because he is so provocative. gil is like a fine cheese, he just improves with age, but i suspect that gil smells better then cheese. this is a very good movie because it is very funny and very scary.
